data.lore: Thresh is a sadistic, spectral reaper who relishes tormenting the living and the dead. Once a jailer who mercilessly brutalized all under his charge, Thresh was hanged from his own chains by the prisoners he had tortured. With his vicious essence unbound, the Chain Warden roams Runeterra in search of prey. He derives twisted joy from slowly breaking the minds of his most defiant victims, before trapping their souls within the sickly green light of his lantern.
data.name: Thresh
data.title: the Chain Warden

spells.tooltip:
Grab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them.
Throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.
spells.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Grab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them. Throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds. Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy. Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.
spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

spells.tooltip:
Create a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you.
Throw the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Create a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you. Throw the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him. Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.
spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Deal {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Knock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.
spells.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Deal {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking. This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack. Active: Knock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.
spells.name: Flay
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

spells.tooltip:
Trap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
Creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Trap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken. Creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall. Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
spells.name: The Box
spells.sanitizedDescription: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
